query:
SELECT LOWER(supplier) as supplier_lower, COUNT(DISTINCT supplier) as variations, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT supplier SEPARATOR ' | ') as all_variations
FROM defects
GROUP BY LOWER(supplier)
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT supplier) > 1;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4GJHCuwNTEenDTS.648275377d58 --database o7SrWWu7Rrxp5u67zP2qqx --execute SELECT LOWER(supplier) as supplier_lower, COUNT(DISTINCT supplier) as variations, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT supplier SEPARATOR ' | ') as all_variations
FROM defects
GROUP BY LOWER(supplier)
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT supplier) > 1;
